resource.chars:
Plate XII
Various forms of monstrosity, produced by
excess of growth from the nucleus.
Figs 1,3,7, small Australian disks, with vertical
crests:- 35 diam
Fig 2. Two view of a disk from the Philippine shores,
having a simple plane on one side, and <s>a double</s> two planes,
meeting at an acute angle, on the other:- 6 diam.
Figs. 4,5, Two views of the same disk, showing the ori-
gin of the double plane from the nucleus, enlarged 35 diam.
Fig. 6. Disk from the Agean sea, with a tri-radiate
crest:- 35 diam.
